definition: to renege/to go back (on a deal)/to back out (of a promise)
to turn over/to flip over/to overturn/to rummage through/to translate/to decode/to double/to climb over or into/to cross

sentences.english: Remember, once you've signed the contract, there's no turning back.
sentences.chinese: 一旦你簽署了合約，就無法翻悔。
